name: Cursed Island (Hollow Neko)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

This is a 2D platformer game in which you're a pirate who needs to escape from his ship because it's being attacked.

It's my first game ever made so it may have bugs and it's kinda short, but I  have polished it as much as I could, so I hope is enjoyable for everybody. Although the game is in Spanish, don't worry, as there are almost no texts. The rest of my games are/will be in English.

Maybe I upload more levels and fix bugs in next updates, but I don't promise anything.

CONTROLS:

-In the menus, press W and S to move up/down and SPACE to confirm your selection

-Some buttons in the menus work by clicking with the mouse on them

-The controls to play are explained in-game

Hollow Neko (c) 2019-2020
